channel.title: Iphone 5 vs samsung galaxy s3
channel.description:
Hello well you all now that the iphone 5 has been released xd iphone 5 smaller larger faster an little bit better camera then the iphone 4s and ios 6 the newest software samsung galaxy s3 does have a quad core processor 8 mgp camera. Android. and there is a new update for it jelly bean the newest firmware its alot larger then iphone 5 my opinion is samsung galaxy s3 whats your opinion whats a better phone ?
Discuss

item.title: Iphone 5 vs samsung galaxy s3
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

thakillah:

Gslaxy note 2 where do you have to put it better get an tablet lol but yeah titanium cover so thephone cant break and bullet proof touch screen would be amazing

you would put it in your pocket where else? lol if you can fit an s3 then there really isnt a reason you shouldnt be able to fit a note 2(the note 2 is only 1 cm wider, 1.5 cm longer and 0.8 mm thicker)

you can compare phone sizes here at http://www.phonearena.com/phones/Samsung-Epic-4G-Touch_id5537/size the phone for this link is my current phone. they are nearly the same thickness. according to one article(http://www.autoomobile.com/news/samsung-galaxy-note-2-vs-s3-5/1004180/) I read that the note 2 is to the galaxy s3 as the ds is to ds XL. basically as a lot of the same features and looks just bigger screen and a bit larger size(only length wise) with an S pen which makes it all worth it.

say some idea pops in your head but you dont have to time to think about it very long. get your note 2 out take the s pen out touch the screen with the button press on the pen voila you have a note pad. jot down the idea for later. its a whole lot faster than typing it into your phone and you could try to use your voice input but that isnt always the best though it does work pretty well from my experience. also if you are a graphic artist say you have an idea for new artwork your would like to create, heck you could even have a rough sketch on your phone. I can’t draw or anything graphical but if I could i would be pretty interested in being to use my phone as a mini graphics tablet.

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 5 vs samsung galaxy s3
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

ahem. I know this phone isn’t the phones in this thread but… The galaxy note 2 steals the show. http://www.gsmarena.com/samsung_galaxy_note_ii_n7100-4854.php http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5DcgZum8M1o I know im getting the note 2 when ever possible(have to get an early upgrade). imho this is the most versatile phone, and will stay relevant even next year when all the new phones come out like the gs4 b/c it will be so useful. One thing I wish samsung would do is change the design of the current galaxy line so all the ifans will stop saying that samsung is making the phone look like their precious iphail–also this current design is stagnate to me everyone makes smartphones that are rectangles with rounded edges. I especially hate how they have that gay rectangle home button. they need to just opt out of the captive buttons and go for the better option of the native nav bar. also for the shape all they need to do is make it a trapezoid by making one side tapered but keeping rounded corners or even move away from the 4 sided designs all together. I think it would be cool if they worked in titanium and/or carbon-fiber into the design through trim or accents.

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 5 vs samsung galaxy s3
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

KroniKz_:

Good lies in that picture.

The iPhone 5 does not have a quad core processor. It has a dual core processor clocked at 1.3 GHz. The S3 has four Cortex A9 cores clocked at 1.4 GHz.

Some of the other features listed at just laughable. Panorama has been on Android devices for awhile now. All new maps? Last I heard everyone is hating on the default maps in the iPhone 5. As for free OS updates?? No way!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 5 vs samsung galaxy s3
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:28, topic:461341”]Samsung got in trouble for copying some of the features that the iphone has which they really didn’t need to do since the s3 is faaar superior.
Iphones are just designer phones in a sense.[/quote]

Let’s see how long the SIII will live compared to the iPhone 5.

Looking up a few sites a Galaxy phone has an average lifespan of about 2 years (Before it starts crapping out)
Compared to the iPhone, it has a lifespan of 5 years. (Before it starts crapping out)

And this isn’t any specific model I researched, just the Samsung Galaxy and Apple iPhone in general.

I agree the Samsung has better qualities, but the iPhone will live longer and be a more stable phone.

Read full topic
